import React, { useState,useEffect } from "react"; import '../App.css' import { MDBContainer, MDBTabPane, MDBTabContent, MDBNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink } from "mdbreact"; import { fetchRecord, fetchProducts, fetchFashion } from '../actions/index' import {connect} from 'react-redux' function TabsDefault(props) { const [activeItem, setItem] = useState(1) useEffect(() => { props.fetchProducts(); },[]) const toggle = (tab) => { if (activeItem == tab) { setItem(tab); } console.log(tab, "tab"); console.log(activeItem, "active"); }; return ( toggle(1)} role="tab" > All toggle(2,props.fetchFashion())} role="tab" > Fashion toggle(3,props.fetchRecord("electronics"))} role="tab" > Electronics
{props.products.products && props.products.products.map(products => (
New

{products.title}

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}
{props.products.products && props.products.products.map(products => (

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}
{props.products[2] && props.products[2].map(products => (
New

{products.title}

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}
); } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ fetchProducts: () => { dispatch(fetchProducts()) }, fetchRecord: (search) => { dispatch(fetchRecord(search)) }, fetchFashion: () => { dispatch(fetchFashion()) } }) const mapStateToProps = state => { // console.log(state); return { products: state.products } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps) (TabsDefault);
